alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 6:23PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cache and eastern Box Elder Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 623 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Peter, or near Logan, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Logan, Cache, Smithfield, Lewiston, Clarkston, Trenton, Benson, Peter, North Logan, Nibley, Hyde Park, Richmond, Millville, Mendon, Newton, Amalga, Deweyville, Cornish and Collinston. This includes US Route 89 near mile marker 459. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
